reviewText: Received (Denshin Mamotte Syugogetten) March 10 ahead of time. Its been a few years since I watch the anime it was great to finely get it. but  this anime some what fellows the manga. . It starts out in the second manga on chapter 27  then it goes from there .I wise I knew that there was another Mamotte Syugogetten first season I would like to own them both . This anime was funny to watch . If I had the total series of Mamotte Shugogetten? it would be great but still I give this anime a (5) stars rating?
